text: Texas Lutheran University is a private Lutheran university in Seguin, Texas, United States. It is a small school with about 1300 students enrolled and it was founded in 1891. == References == == Other websites == * Texas Lutheran University â€“ official site Category:Christian colleges and universities in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in Texas Category:1891 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in Texas
